Name: Manny Boxing VR
About the game: Manny Boxing VR is aimed at realistic Boxing games using virtual reality systems. If you want to enjoy Boxing through VR, Manny Boxing VR will be a choice without regret! features Boxing play with Manny Pacquiao Various boxing training modes - Mitt training ( with Manny ) - Dummy hitting practice - Punching speed ball - Heavy Bag Training Advanced AI divided by 5 difficulty levels Multiplayer boxing in real-time how to Play Boxing is a Dynamic sport played using gloves to hit opponent in the Boxing ring. Avoiding the opponent's attack, Attack your opponent in various ways. Challenge the best boxers!
Meta Title: Manny Boxing VR: May 27, 2022, Appnori Inc. and Full Over...
